generics.abstractions

Interface PairSpecification

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DominoInt, GenericDomino, GenericPair, PairAbstraction

    public interface PairSpecification
    A 2-tuple (pair) of things using an interface rather than a generic class.
    The genericity is simulated by defining elements to be Objects

    For teaching advanced OO concepts in Java - genericity
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    J Paul Gibson
